data.actual_result: The "Remove From Group" button is still there and tapping it does nothing.
data.expected_result: The "Profile" and "Message" buttons are the only ones shown.
data.short_description: Remove From Group button doesn't go away when viewing the profile of someone who's no longer in a group DM
data.steps_to_repro: - Start a Group DM - Remove one of the members. - Tap their username from the message that says that you removed them.
